definition[0]: an ironic situation is one that is unusual or amusing because something strange happens, or the opposite of what is expected happens or is true
example[0]: Your car was stolen at the police station! How ironic!
example[1]: It’s ironic that her husband smoked for thirty years, and yet she’s the one who died of lung cancer.
example[2]: In an ironic twist, the most trustworthy character in the film turned out to be the thief.
definition[1]: using words that are the opposite of what you really mean, often in a joking way
example[4]: When I told Lucy I loved her book, she thought I was being ironic.
